name: ui_control
Toggle fans
Toggle aux lights
Temperature formatting
func:
msg.topic = "telemetry"
msg.payload.variable = "temperature"
msg.payload.value = msg.payload.temperature
return msg;

name: Humidity formatting
func:
msg.topic = "telemetry"
msg.payload.variable = "humidity"
msg.payload.value = msg.payload.humidity
return msg;

name: Lighting formatting
func:
msg.topic = "telemetry"
msg.payload.variable = "light"
msg.payload.value = msg.payload.light
return msg;

name: Toggle main lights
Sunrise
Sunset
